article_title: Business Intelligence Tools Find Broader Audience, Qlik CEO Says
article_text: Security and regulatory concerns have limited health care providers’ use of offshore IT services, but pressure to reduce costs is prompting them to find ways to leverage the offshore model while safeguarding sensitive data.

twitter.description: Complex tools designed for expert users are being replaced with “consumerized” analytic software.
twitter.title: Business Intelligence Tools Find Broader Audience, Qlik CEO Says
